Viewing OneNote 2010 notes by last edit date

It is surprisingly hard to figure out how to view your OneNote 2010 notes by date.  A common scenario is that I want to view the notes I took yesterday.   In both Google Docs and Evernote, this is the default view (all notes sorted descending by date).

In OneNote 2010, here's how you do it:

Share Menu->Recent Edits->Since Yesterday 

This will find all notes, sorted by date, since yesterday.

Seems like this should be in the "View" or "Review" menu, as opposed to the "Share" menu.

Posted by Doug Tarr
